June 10, 1945 D Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class B)
Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class B) 20 March Contest (Music and Inspection Points) Belle Vue Marching Contest belle-vue-marching-contest-class-b
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £10, 3rd £4, 4th £2. 6 bands competed.
